name: tiny-mushroom
short_effect: Fire Red and Leaf Green: Trade two for prior Level-up moves. Sell for 250 Pokédollars, or to Hungry Maid for 500 Pokédollars.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
A plain, ordinary
mushroom.
Can be sold cheaply.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
A plain mushroom
that would sell
at a cheap price.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
A small and rare mushroom.
It is quite popular among certain
people.
